prefixDef.p: This prefix resolves references to the lexical data source.
This prefix resolves references to the Digital Repository Service.

choice.seg: you (must not) be going around eating
while (going around) sick with periodic illness
something cooked (by them), their cooking, a meal
to go around acting silly' (i.e., carelessly)
one is going around eating meals
you will take it with you
whenever one goes around eating (different) meals

ab.seg: One who is a healer must take care of himself.
Medicine men and healers must not go about eating the cooking of several different women.
Truly, he must be careful about eating food cooked outside his own home.
There are times our women are sick during the new moon phase with their personal illness.
You may eat something they cooked.
This will kill any medicine you know.
It is absolutely forbidden to go carelessly about eating in many places.
If you plan to go somewhere and spend the day, you should be prepared to cook for yourself and take your own food along with you wherever you go.
If you follow these instructions, you will retain knowledge of good medicine for a long time.
“When you eat at different places, your knowledge of medicine dies,” said Ganasda Ditsiti who was Switch Striker and lived long ago.
They spoke of what they were taught.
“Keep in your memory what I have said,” cautioned Ganasda Ditsiti who was Switch Striker.

d:noteBlock.note: see previous word; above with irregular 1SG>AN -ciiya-(?)
yu = emphatic clitic (?); or INF here (?), with following word 'he is to take care of himself'
cf. CRG 97-98: may suggest that WJ thinks previous word is an INF form; also CRG 342
final <Ᏼ> /yv/ here for expected <Ꮿ> /ya/ ; cf. ạ²ni²ge²³hya 'women' (DF1975:16) "
ᎾᏍᎩᏃ ᎢᏳᏍᏗ nasgi iyusdi = 'that's why, therefore; because'
read: 'you will cook your provisions for yourself'
see previous word; above with irregular 1SG>AN -ciiya-(?)
WJ writes <Ꮈ> /lv/ for <Ꮲ> /hlv/ here ; for final /-hi/ sc. /-ʔi/
